raw_body: Patuwathavithana – Mrs. Dorathy – Beloved wife of late Prof. C Patuwathavithana (Vice Chancellor, Moratuwa University), mother of Dilrukshi and Chatura, mother-in-law of Nathan and Suram, grandmother of Eshal,Vishan and Ranithri, passed away peacefully. The remains lie at Laksiri Funeral Parlour, Nalluruwa, Panadura. Funeral services will be held on Tuesday 19th September at 3 p.m. at Minuwanpitiya Cemetery, Panadura..0918202301
